title: What were the observed effects of magnetic sleep and how do they challenge skepticism?
first_phrase: In this last part of the text, the author reflects on the observations during a magnetism experiment conducted by Mr. Donato on Miss L. She remained motionless and in a prayer-like position after being magnetized. The author saw tears and pain expression on Miss L.'s face in moments of extreme sensitivity. After each session, Miss L. was put back to normal by blowing air into her eyes. The author admits that in light of the observations, the magnetic phenomena must be considered factual.

last_phrase: In conclusion, the observed phenomena of magnetism should be considered undeniable, even if they are not tainted with spiritualism. However, despite the evidence, these natural occurrences may still be dismissed by the public as a hoax, similar to other predictions and prophecies.
